newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar firms to 473.50/474.50/dlr close.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar firms to 473.50/474.50/dlr close.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed firm against the dollar at 473.50/474.50 as investors sold dollars to buy bolivar-denominated Central Bank TEMs, traders said.
The unit closed at 474.00/475.00 per dollar on Tuesday.
"There just wasn't any bolivars being offered ... and the Central Bank continued to sell dollars, which brought the rate down," one trader said.
The Central Bank sold Wednesday morning 60 billion bolivars ($127 million) of TEMs in its regular weekly auction.
